titleStmt.title: The lives of sundry eminent persons in this later age in two parts : I. of divines, II. of nobility and gentry of both sexes / by Samuel Clark ... ; printed and reviewed by himself just before his death ; to which is added his own life and the lives of the Countess of Suffolk, Sir Nathaniel Barnardiston, Mr. Richard Blackerby and Mr. Samuel Fairclough, drawn up by other hands.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
Part 2, p. 149-150 are torn in the filmed copy; p. 144-161 photographed from Newberry Library copy and inserted at the end.
